channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024101823
item.description:
Report X-2024101823

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-04T12:23:29+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-30
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Alaska Airlines
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening shipment through x ray found pieces that looked like aerosol cans. Performed physical search and found 2 aerosol cans. 2 X 8 ounce cooking spray.
